Articles.Content: Because Kerbals are lazy creature we\'ve engineered this lander so that they don\'t have to climb too far to reach the ground. Incidentally, this also reduces injuries due to falling. Also, booster uses jet engines instead of solid rocket boosters. This does really benefit from MechJeb ascent auto pilot as the Jet Engines can make things a tad unstable when it first lifts off.

WOW thats a creative ship it looks like stock parts only right?

jeb approves

When life gives you lemons, insert gasoline into them and light it on fire. Or something like that.
